title: Average ticket price of the Los Angeles Chargers 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2011 to 2008.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Los Angeles Chargers games in the National Football League from 2006 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average ticket price was at 165.77 U.S. dollars .
